enable_overflow_scroll.comment: Sets maximum box height in px, to disable indicate 0

exclude.label: Exclude filters from Homepage
exclude.comment: List comma-separated attribute codes like: category, price, color.

hide_one_value.label: Hide filters with one available option

configurable_images.label: Image-Related Attributes
configurable_images.comment: Comma-separated list of attribute codes to show specific image for configurable products. This function could make category loading slower.

position.label: Sorting Position
position.comment: Set 0 to show filter at the top, and 99 to show it at the bottom

show_all_categories.label: Render All Categories Tree
show_all_categories.comment: Render Full Categories Tree or Only For Current Category Path

categories_max_options.label: Number of Unfolded Options
categories_max_options.comment: Leave zero to get all options unfolded.

use_custom_ranges.label: Use Custom Ranges
use_custom_ranges.comment: Please define ranges in Catalog -> Improved Navigation -> Price Ranges

heading.label: Category Title and Description
heading.comment: Please open Catalog -> Improved Navigation -> Filters -> [open filter] -> Options -> [open option] in order to define Title, Description, Image and CMS block for your filter options.

add_title.label: Add selected filter title to Category Name

add_description.label: Add selected filter description to Category Description

add_image.label: Replace Category Image
add_image.comment: Category Image will be replaced if selected filter option have it`s own image uploaded.

add_cms_block.label: Replace Category CMS Block
add_cms_block.comment: Category CMS Block will be replaced in case selected filter option have it`s own defined.

meta.label: Category Meta Tags
meta.comment: Please open Catalog -> Improved Navigation -> Filters -> [open filter] -> Options -> [open option] in order to define Meta-Title, Meta-Description and Meta-Keywords for your filter options.

add_description.label: Add selected filter descriptions to Category Meta-Description

seotoolkit_text_label.label: To get more advanced SEO instruments please check out Amasty SEO Toolkit extension

hide_attributes.label: Hide Attribute Names
hide_attributes.comment:
Show /shopby/canon/black instead of /shopby/brand-canon/color-black.
If attribute values are not unique, the module adds the dash symbol "-" for them.

redirects_enabled.label: Redirect to SEO URL if possible
redirects_enabled.comment: Standard Magento category pages with applied filters will be redirected to Amasty-style URLs.

key.label: URL Key
key.comment:
/[url_key] page will be created with all the products in store listed.
Url key also separates category part and filter parameters part of URL.

option_char.label: Separate attribute options with
option_char.comment: For example, if a customer selects 3 options for the attribute `color`, the URL will look like http://example.com/red-green-blue.html

allow_utf8.label: Allow the UTF-8 for the URLs
allow_utf8.comment: Provide the support of the national symbols

enable_shopby_page.label: Enable ShopBy Page
enable_shopby_page.comment: Activates /[URL Key] page which displays all the products in the store and allows to filter them.</br> Disabling this setting will give 404 Not Found in case you use home page navigation or display the attribute on the product page.

noindex_multiple.label: Noindex when multiple attribute filters applied

price_noindex.label: NoIndex when filtered by price
price_noindex.comment: Don`t recommend Google index pages with price filter applied.

price_nofollow.label: NoFollow when filtered by price
price_nofollow.comment: Don`t recommend Google follow links on pages with price filter applied.

price_rel_nofollow.label: Rel NoFollow for Price Ranges links
price_rel_nofollow.comment: Adds rel=nofollow for price filter links.

cat_noindex.label: Noindex the following categories
cat_noindex.comment: Comma separated list of categories IDs where noindex should be shown

cat_nofollow.label: Nofollow the following categories
cat_nofollow.comment: Comma separated list of categories IDs where nofollow should be shown

canonical_cat.label: Canonical URL on the Category Pages

prev_next.label: Render Prev/Next tags on improved navigation pages
prev_next.comment: When enabled, it helps Google to index paginated content. See more details here: https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/1663744

page_match_strict.label: Use strict Pages matching
page_match_strict.comment: In strict mode page not match when extra attribute filters or values present

query_param.label: Query param for URLs with multiple attributes
query_param.comment: Allows you to tell Google (in the webmaster panel) to skip URL with 2+ values of the same attribute. Will add param_name=true to such urls. Leave empty if you are not sure how to use it.

exclude_user_agent.label: Hide layered navigation for these user agents
exclude_user_agent.comment: List comma-separated user agents like: Googlebot, MSNBot, YandexBot to restrict layered navigation urls crawling.
exclude_user_agent.tooltip: Layered Navigation HTML code will be cut out from the output to defined user agents. All other visitors will see layered navigation ordinary way.

attr.label: Brand Attribute Code
attr.comment: Used to generate Brand Pages. Brand pages are always visible for search engines.

url_key.label: Brand URL Key
url_key.comment:
Adds a key before brand name in URL like /[key]/brand-name.html
You can create All Brands CMS page for more user friendly experience.

show_images.label: Show logos instead of labels on brand list block
show_images.comment: Upload images for brand filter options to make this work.

improved_title.label: Replace the page title with the data from ILN module
improved_title.comment: Suppress "Enable Default Category Title" option if it already changed by Amasty Improved Navigation

improved_meta.label: Replace the meta description with the data from ILN module
improved_meta.comment: Suppress "Enable Default Category Meta Description" option if it already changed by Amasty Improved Navigation
